name: GKAccessPoint
desc: An object that allows players to view and manage their Game Center information from within your game.

items.name: var location: GKAccessPoint.Location
items.desc: The corner of the screen to display the access point.

items.name: enum GKAccessPoint.Location
items.desc: Specifies the corner of the screen to display the access point.

items.name: var frameInScreenCoordinates: CGRect
items.desc: The frame of the access point in screen coordinates.

items.name: var parentWindow: UIWindow?
items.desc: The window that contains the access point.

items.name: var isActive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether to display the access point.

items.name: var isPresentingGameCenter: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the game is presenting the Game Center dashboard.

items.name: var isVisible: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the access point is visible.

items.name: var showHighlights: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to display highlights for achievements and current ranks for leaderboards.

items.name: var isFocused: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the access point is in focus on tvOS.

items.name: func trigger(state: GKGameCenterViewControllerState, handler: () -> Void)
items.desc: Displays the Game Center dashboard in the specified state.
